-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Konami's famed vampire hunting series makes its debut on the PlayStation 2 with 
Castlevania: Lament of Innocence. It tells the story of the Belmont family's 
first encounter with the dark lord Dracula, and connects the lineage of previous 
Belmont adventurers. Gameplay blends the series' trademark 2D whip-cracking and 
platforming elements with a new detailed 3D environment.

*3D environment; extra ordinary attack system offers combos and other cool 
steps; Orchestral soundtrack and character voiceovers; Legendary game play and 
huge enemies

Release Date: October 21, 2003
M for Mature: Mild Realistic Violence, Blood and Gore
Genre: Third-Person Action
Publisher: Konami
Developer: Konami TYO
